description:
Nami arrives at the train station a minute too late, Sanji makes his presence aboard the sea train known, and the search for Luffy and Zoro continues!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sanji Barges In! Sea Train Battle in the Storm!
Sanji Totsunyuu! Arashi no Naka no Umiressha Battle!
Sanji s`est infiltré ! Le train des mers dans la tempête !
Санджи Идёт на штурм! Битва в шторм на морепоезде!
サンジ突入! 嵐の中の海列車バトル!
